Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Ender::
       He was still there silent.  "I have to agree with Killfest too.  
However, I think we should tone down the slaughter.  The Maximals are 
complacent right now but they could easily attack us.  If we kill too many of 
them they may very well do that.  I think we should separate them then send a 
forged video of the others being killed.  That way they still crack without 
as much risk to us.  I think Blaze said he(?) was a computer specialist.  He 
should be able to make an indistinguishable video."

--part1_8a.b0d011c.28ac7fda_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
